name: Io the Sewer Apprentice
description:
The City is experiencing some mysterious earthquakes coming from the sewers... As Io, the sewer apprentice; it is your responsibility to find out what is happening in there!

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019! The theme was "Only one [...]", so here's a RPG where creatures only have one stat!

Features:

  • Photorealistic graphics
  • Combat system with only one stat to worry about
  • Learn your opponent's abilities after defeating them!
  • 21 moves in total!
  • A dumb story with politics in the video game.
